column5: Grab it during a frost, Kevin.
As Roy said, frost.  If you can wait and want to be even safer wait till it's below zero for over a week.
Very nice report gentlemen!  Keep your hooks sharp!

what about when i bring it in heat in my garage ?  i mean when they unthaw the bees will wake up and a awrm will be in the garage how do i get ride of the bees .   im planning to go and grab it when the frost comes and put it in a big box ?

PM Mike Gray as he might be able to help out there.  Here are the ones that were still looking for the nest around my place after one day (22 on the fly tape + flies).  The nest I had was not even as big as a tennis ball so keep in mind just how many you will have buzzing around...
Good advice. I don't want to mislead you with the wasp disposal. BTW, that fire hydrant must be a buggar to find in the winter.
LOL, they just primed it yesterday for a new coat of yellow today
Not to get off topic, but awesome fish 24/7!!!
Do you find the smallies take the jig on the fall most of the time or do you work it actively?

the first fall in the most important. usualy they hit on it.  then a couple of SLOW jigs.   when the jig is straight down near the boat i lift it up 6 '' off the bottom. slow jigging. this will get the fatties.
Just incredible! Sweet hawgs there guys, thanks for posting.  I've heard of double bagging a nest (garbage bags) and just let the wasps die off. Maybe triple bag that one, looks huge!
Your a tripple bagger...  HAHAHAHA
Awesome fish guys!!!  Ever thought of getting a Go Pro head hd cam,  would be pretty cool videos with the fish you guys catch!
Nice going Kevin    Some doozers in there

Well lets start this of with mikes mount. its finaly here.          Some fish are just plain finiky.     Hair line finiky .    other brutes just take the lure right in.  Sly with a low 5lbs bass.    This bawss was the perfect hook set over 30 FOW.      They were putting on the feed bag late summer.  Yet another pig on the same day.     hello cheap camera.    Bye    camera.    Qc smallies are starting to hit hard.    and when the sun starts to set.    The new P.B.'s come out to play.  Oh yeah forgot to mention some sweet    pike action also.    did you ever hear about fishing swimmers in the fall ?    RIGHT ON THE MONEY!    i was told to use white tubes... i dont know man....    Almost hit this thing while casting tight on shore.    Here comes the Sun and i say.... it's all right.      and to end this awesome update....  yet another bee hive.    Gatta love em.
Someone CALL 911 !!!! Awesome hawgs!!!
Nice mount  Some sweet fish there and great pictures.  Guess you'll be needing a new camera now
Bah minnows...those some very nice bass there fella
Man---you guys catch some beauts over there
Simply awesome.  TFS.
nice mount
Oh Lawdy days'um NICE BASS!!  And pike!  And beeeeees.  I love your reports....one day I'm going fishing with you...we will have ourselves some fun  Keep the good stuff coming!
Fantastic report Kevin. Based on our new fish grading system, I'd say those are super monsters. Thanks for the drool.
You know that you can buy batteries for cameras eh Kevin.... they're not all disposables.  Some nice little fishies in those pictures !
bro beau poisson , Them is big bass in any language . Got to get out there to fish with ya
Hmmmmmmmmmmm.......Have you guys ever tried using ' FROGS ' as bait to catch those French Bass
How do ya think they got so big , wasnt from eating "TADPOLES" lol
I love Quebec updates.   Keep em coming.
Ostie!!!  Belle Peche Mon Homme!
Crazy big fish! Awesome
nice fish
some SWEET 'Smallie' Pics  Rick

ask whitespinnerbait.............  If you really truely want to fish with us.  you are more than welcome.  just neeed a solid plan and match the work days with the week ends and BOOM!  or some type of trade fish.  im loving your big fish in your neck of the woods.
As usual, some really nice bass and quality pictures. You have a gem of a lake there.
I've been real sick.  But yes I would BUT some may take it the wrong way so today, I won't go there...
awesome report
Incredible, monsters for sure.  I'm guessing with this warm indian summer we're having right now this next few days will be on fire too.
some awesome bass there for sure man !!!! you guys did amazing,some real brute pike there as well..!!! cheers
i want to add this bees nest as a decoration in my garage . whats the best way to grab that thing ?
